name: KUTEEPIES – Interactive Learning Platform
description: A responsive and user-friendly educational platform offering a range of skill-based courses, including Photoshop, Animation, Graphic Design, and Music Production. Designed with accessibility in mind, it features intuitive navigation, interactive lessons, and a clean layout to enhance the learning experience across all devices.

name: LoanPulse Notify – Due Date Reminder System
description: LoanPulse Notify – Due Date Reminder System is a software solution designed to manage loan repayments. It connects with Google Sheets to track due dates and sends email reminders to users, ensuring they never miss a payment. The system includes a scheduling mechanism, secure authentication with service account credentials, and real-time logging for reliability.

name: Sportify Prime FC – Live Sports Event Platform
description: A fully responsive and interactive web application built for streaming live sports events. It features a custom-built video player with advanced controls including play/pause, seek, fullscreen, volume, and responsive scaling—offering a seamless viewing experience. The platform combines intuitive navigation with real-time content updates to ensure smooth performance across all devices.

name: Decent Coaching Classes – Educational Website
description: An elegant and responsive website built for a coaching institute, featuring a clean UI, intuitive structure, and a professional design focused on accessibility and user experience.

name: CourtConnect – Legal Case Search Platform
description: A dynamic and responsive web app for streamlined legal case research. It features advanced exact and partial match search, category-based filters, and a modern dark-themed UI—powered by a structured case law database, secured by Google for reliable access and data protection.

name: CourtConnect – Admin & Intern Case Submission Portal
description: A secure and role-based case law management system designed for collaborative data entry and verification. Interns can log in and submit case details through a structured form, while admins access a dedicated dashboard to review, edit, and approve submissions before they are added to the main database. Features include separate login panels for interns and admins, real-time data handling, and a clean, responsive interface—secured by Google for safe access and authentication.

name: Decent CBSE – Educational Website
description: A professionally designed website for a CBSE school, combining a clean layout, responsive design, and user-centric navigation to effectively showcase institutional information and updates.

name: Linking Website
description: A responsive and dynamic website designed to deliver a smooth user experience, featuring shortcut navigation for quick access to key links. The clean, modern layout ensures easy exploration of content, with seamless transitions and intuitive navigation optimized for all devices.
